Articles.Content: Mods: Docking port alignment indicator, trajectories, Kerbal-Constructs, RasterProp Monitor, Mod. Manager and Warp Everywhere. After loading my save on an altitude of about 1200 M above the surface of Eve, the game functions normally for around 3 seconds before my ship explodes, put at an altitude of 139822 M and speed of, ahem, 3542319.9 M/s. Any help would be appreciated, thanks!
